description: This file is a shell script for managing the download, verification, extraction, and post-processing of application packages in an embedded or appliance environment. It handles downloading packages via a packager service, verifies signatures, manages container configurations, and executes post-installation scripts.

classes.name: <none>
classes.description: This is a shell script and does not define classes.

methods.name: generateDownloadUrl
methods.description: Generates a JSON-RPC request for the packager service to initiate download of a package.

methods.name: sendRequestToPackager
methods.description: Sends the JSON-RPC request to the packager and handles the response status.

methods.name: invokePackager
methods.description: Manages retries and invokes the packager service to start the download process.
